mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, GID, COM_CODE, GOOUTWORK_DATE, GOOUTWORK_GOD, GOOUTWORK_OUTD, GOOUTWORK_TIME from (SELECT * FROM tb_gooutwork where gid = #{ gId } and COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY gooutwork_date DESC)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }

select * from (select rownum rnum, GID, COM_CODE, GOOUTWORK_DATE, GOOUTWORK_GOD, GOOUTWORK_OUTD, GOOUTWORK_TIME from (SELECT * FROM tb_gooutwork where COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY gooutwork_date DESC)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }

select * from (select rownum rnum, GID, COM_CODE, GOOUTWORK_DATE, GOOUTWORK_GOD, GOOUTWORK_OUTD, GOOUTWORK_TIME from (SELECT * FROM tb_gooutwork where COM_CODE = #{comCode} and gid = #{gId} ORDER BY gooutwork_date DESC)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }

select count(*) from tb_gooutwork where gid = #{ gId } and COM_CODE = #{comCode}
select count(*) from tb_gooutwork where COM_CODE = #{comCode}
select count(*) from tb_gooutwork where COM_CODE = #{comCode} and GOOUTWORK_DATE between #{ begin } and #{ end }
select count(*) from tb_gooutwork where COM_CODE = #{comCode} and gid = #{ gId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GOOUTWORK (GOOUTWORK_DATE, GOOUTWORK_GOD, GOOUTWORK_OUTD, GOOUTWORK_TIME, GID, COM_CODE) SELECT GOOUTWORK_DATE, null, null, null, #{gId}, #{comCode} FROM ( SELECT #{userEntry} + LEVEL - 1 AS GOOUTWORK_DATE FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TRUNC(sysdate) - #{userEntry} + 1) day WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_GOOUTWORK WHERE GOOUTWORK_DATE = day.GOOUTWORK_DATE and gid = #{ gId } and COM_CODE = #{comCode})
mapper.update: update tb_gooutwork set GOOUTWORK_outd = #{outDate}, GOOUTWORK_TIME = #{time} where gid = #{ gId } and com_code = #{ comCode } and to_date(gooutwork_date,'yy-MM-dd') = to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd')
